title: Client wont lunch
body:
Hey,
so since this morning, my league client wont lunch after i click on "LUNCH" it just disappears and the log in client never comes up.

any help? i tried to repair the files but it still the same, the only solution i have is having to restart my whole computer .

replies.body:
The *Patching Issues* guide that *Hyperiod3182* linked is a good place to start, but specifically when this issue happens, it's most often caused by League missing certain administrative privileges that prevent it from running correctly. My recommendation is to ensure these have been assigned to League properly by working through our [permissions guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

Hello,
Please have a look at the Knowledge base and no need to "up....":
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues
